response.original_title: Untitled Muhammad Abed Baryal film (Whitney Wright)
response.overview: Muhammad Abed Baryal has a deep interest in creating a film based on the life and travels of Whitney Wright, a pornographic actress who has traveled to countries like Afghanistan, Syria, Iran, and Iraq. I have reached out to her for the role, and while she appreciated my interest, she kindly declined, stating that she doesnâ€™t see a connection between her career in adult films and the topics of her travels.  Despite this, I am still passionate about bringing this unique narrative to life. I believe her story, intertwined with her travels in some of the most complex regions of the world, can provide a compelling and thought-provoking film. While this particular collaboration did not come to fruition, I remain committed to pursuing this project and believe that it holds significant artistic potential.
response.tagline: Beyond the Screen: A Journey Through Borders and Boundaries.
response.title: Untitled Muhammad Abed Baryal film (Whitney Wright)
